t: Amazon.com: Zapps Potato Chips 1.5 Ounce 30 count Variety Sampler Pack : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: This is a good variety pack to test out the different flavors they make. I wasn't a fan of several flavors only because I tend to just like spicy chips but they are good quality. Would buy again but can't afford the calories. Recommend trying Zapps for a pleasant change.

t: Zapp's - Wikipedia
s: April 14, 2025 - Zapp's is a brand of potato chip made in the United States. The chips are kettle-cooked in peanut oil (instead of vegetable oil, which many other companies use), except for the Bourbon St. Smokey Sweet flavor which are 'thin & crispy'. Zapp's market themselves with their Cajun heritage, using names such as "Spicy ...
